title: Houdini H4-013904T Glass Rimmer, 5 Inch Diameter, Stainless Steel,0.25 cubid feet
features: HIGH QUALTIY: Compact stainless steel glass rimmer for tastier drinks; simply fill with salt or sugar, then dip!
PERFECT TOOL FOR THE JOB: Great for adding salt and other spices to drinks like Margaritas, Bloody Marys, Gimlets and more!
PREMIUM MATERIALS: Made from premium stainless steel that is bpa-free and food safe
IDEAL SIZE: Approximately 5 inches in diameter
description: Easily add salt or sugar to the rim of your glass. The Houdini Salt Rimmer is great for margaritas, bloody marys or side cars. The stainless steel lid keeps ingredients dry when not in use. Shake it up! Whether you are an at-home mixologist or an amateur wine connoisseur, Houdini by Rabbit provides exceptional tools to inspire you to celebrate the moments. Like Rabbit, Houdini is continually evolving and takes pride in delivering quality and value at an everyday price point.
